name: Photon desktop lamp
tagline: Respository for Particle Photon Desktop Lamp
body:
### General Description of the lamp

This 3D printed desktop lamp is enabled by a [Particle Photon](https://www.particle.io/). The Photon is a prototyping tool that comes with a Wi-Fi chipset. This enables interfacing sensors/actuators to the internet and monitor them remotely. This lamp is equipped
